task.title: How to Make a Breakfast Hash
task.shortdesc: Delicious and filling: the perfect combination!

ul.li: Salt and black pepper to taste
1 medium green or red bell pepper, finely diced
8 ounces package tempeh meat substitute, finely diced
6 leaves kale, stemmed and finely chopped

step.cmd: Add the onion and sauté over MEDIUM heat until translucent.
Add the bell pepper, tempeh, and potatoes.
Turn the heat up to MEDIUM HIGH, and continue to sauté until all are turning golden brown and stir frequently.
Peel and finely chop the onion and garlic, chop the chorizo, dice up the cooked potato and finely chop the parsley.
Gently fry the onion and garlic in a little oil in an ovenproof pan until the onion is soft.
Add the chorizo and fry for 2 to 3 minutes.
Add the potatoes and cook for 5 minutes more, then crack the eggs on top.
Transfer the pan to the preheated oven and bake for 8 minutes.
Sprinkle with sea salt, black pepper and the parsley, to serve.
